title: Financial News - Crypto vs Blockchain - What's Next?
description: The crypto winter has rocked the sector. But is the underlying technology still up to scratch? As the retail phenomenon that was digital assets turns into an institutional opportunity, are banks overlooking the potential of blockchain in their businesses? Join Financial News for a Barron's Live as we ask former UK chancellor Philip Hammond why he has turned his hand to advising crypto custodian Copper, and what a future digital financial assets market based on blockchain could look like.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
